title: Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 12V Battery 100Ah – Safe & Powerful Drop-In Replacement for RV, Van, Marine, Off-Grid – Cylindrical Cells, Internal BMS
amazon_title: Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 12V Battery 100Ah – Safe & Powerful Drop-In Replacement for RV, Van, Marine, Off-Grid – Cylindrical Cells, Internal BMS
description:
Product Description
Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 12V Battery 100Ah Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 12V Battery 100Ah GC2 Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 24V Battery 50Ah Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 12V Battery 270Ah GC3 Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion (LiFePO4) Deep Cycle 12V Battery 100Ah Heated Battle Born Batteries Lithium-Ion Deep Cycle 12V Battery 100Ah GC2 Heated

Weight 31 lbs 31 lbs 31 lbs 80.8 lbs 31 lbs 31 lbs
Dimensions 12.76 × 6.86 × 8.95 in 10.31 × 7.28 × 11.02 in 12.75 × 6.87 × 9 in 22.83 × 7.09 × 13.15 in 12.76 × 6.86 × 8.95 in 10.31 × 7.28 × 11.02 in
features:
Up to a Decade of Use - Enjoy superb return on your investment with this heavy duty 100Ah 12V LiFePO4 battery! This 100Ah 12V lithium battery lasts 3,000 - 5,000 deep discharge cycles, providing up to 10-15 years of power.
Built for Rugged Adventures - Our fast-charging LiFePO4 100Ah 12V batteries are the perfect camper, van, boat, trolling motor, and lithium RV battery. Battle Born Batteries are also made to power industrial, off-grid, and residential backup applications. Let Battle Born’s deep cycle off grid batteries power your adventures!
Designed for Versatility - This eco-conscious and lightweight Battle Born Lithium 100Ah 12V battery can be wired in series or parallel. And because it is designed with safety in mind and doesn't contain any acid, it can be safely mounted in any orientation.
Internal Protection - With a built-in Battery Management System (BMS), Battle Born lithium batteries are well-protected against extreme hot and cold temperatures, high and low voltages, short circuits, and other common causes of battery failure.
Quality You Can Trust – Our cutting-edge facilities are headquartered in Reno, Nevada, the lithium capital of North America. With on-site assembly Battle Born Batteries’ 12V lithium batteries are trusted by customers, celebrities, and top YouTubers, and come with a 10-year warranty and lifetime technical support.

title: Dorman 601-731 Cruise Control Distance Sensor Compatible with Select Ford Models
amazon_title: Dorman 601-731 Cruise Control Distance Sensor Compatible with Select Ford Models
description: This cruise control distance sensor is designed to match the fit and function of the original sensor on specified vehicles, and is engineered for durability and reliable performance. This part is compatible with the following vehicles. Before purchasing, enter your vehicle trim in the garage tool to confirm fitment. [Ford Explorer: 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019]

Restores functionality - reliable replacement for an original part that has failed from an electrical malfunction or collision
Durable construction - this part is made from quality materials to ensure reliable performance and long service life
Trustworthy quality - backed by team of product experts in the United States and more than a century of automotive experience
Ensure fit - to make sure this part fits your exact vehicle, input your make, model and trim level into the garage tool

title: SubZero 80052 52" Extension Quick-Release Handle Ice Scraper and Pivoting Snow Broom (Colors May Vary)
amazon_title: SubZero 80052 52" Extension Quick-Release Handle Ice Scraper and Pivoting Snow Broom (Colors May Vary)
description: For over forty years Hopkins Manufacturing and Subzero have shaped the winter snow and ice tools category. The wide blades on our ice scrapers clear away frost with fewer strokes and less effort, and the powerful ice chippers break up the thickest ice of the season. Our snowbrooms are capable of pushing the wettest, deepest snow from your entire vehicle. Hopkins 52" Quick-Lock snowbroom has all the features needed to withstand the toughest winter weather. The strong aluminum pole is lightweight and easy to use, with a durable ABS blade, and broom head paired with a squeegee rotates 180 degrees to clear snow off at any angle. Colors may vary.
features:
Quick lock extension pole reaches 52"
Extra wide 4.5" scraper blade
Pivoting soft bristle snowbroom and squeegee
Great for trucks, SUV's and RV's
2 soft grips allow for comfort while using, colors may vary

title: Mallory USA Mallory 532 Cool-Force 26” Snowbrush with Ice Scraper for Car, 1 Pack
amazon_title: Mallory USA Mallory 532 Cool-Force 26” Snowbrush with Ice Scraper for Car, 1 Pack
description: The Mallory 26" Cool Snow Tool is one of the most popular snow brushes on the market today. Its compact design and lightweight body make it easy to store and use. Featuring an extra-wide scraper and a two-tone comfort grip, this brush provides every tool needed to clear your vehicle of ice and snow.
features:
26" long for ample reach and compact storage
Features four rows of sturdy bristles
Fast Scraping: 4" chisel ice scarper blade makes for quick front and ice removal
Comfort & Control: Contoured foam grip great for gloves or bare hands to keep you warm and give greater control brushing
Colors may vary. Like receiving a gift, be surprised by which color you receive
Built Tough: Have a problem - Our product comes with a 90-day warranty

title: Subzero Hopkins 16621 Ice Crusher Ice Scraper (Colors May Vary)
amazon_title: Subzero Hopkins 16621 Ice Crusher Ice Scraper (Colors May Vary)
description: The SubZero 11" Ice Crusher Scraper features strong scarper blades, ice chipper and a foam cushioned grip for handling. The scraper is equipped with a blade that clears frost instantly on one end and a separate ice chipper on the other end that improves ice removal capability. The oval shaped foam grip also provides maximum comfort for handling. For over forty years Hopkins Manufacturing and SubZero have shaped the winter snow and ice tools category.
features:
Durable blade to remove frost
Separated ice chippers to break up the thickest ice
Extra wide 4.5" blade
Oval shaped, soft foam grip provides maximum comfort
Features an 11" length that provides great reach

title: Lifeline Aluminum Sport Utility Shovel, 3 Piece Collapsible Design, Perfect Snow Shovel for Car, Camping and Other Outdoor Activities, Red
amazon_title: Lifeline Aluminum Sport Utility Shovel, 3 Piece Collapsible Design, Perfect Snow Shovel for Car, Camping and Other Outdoor Activities, Red
description: Aluminum Sport utility shovel, 3 piece collapsible design, for car, camping and other outdoor activities. Be prepared for inclement weather with Lifeline first Aid's high quality aluminum Sport utility shovel. The aluminum shovels come in six new colors for 2018, and undergo a high quality powder coating process to ensure that the color will remain bright and vivid, even after exposed to the elements. The shovels are available in black, Olive, orange, yellow, blue and red. The sport shovel is constructed from lightweight, durable, high-quality aluminum and is tested internally by Lifeline quality control team. The shovel's designed to easily disassemble into three pieces for easy storage and portability, making it the ideal travel accessory to keep in your car, SUV or recreational activity vehicle, or even to tote with you in your backpack.
features:
3 PIECE COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN: Breaks down to 3 pieces making it easy to store and carry
LIGHTWEIGHT: Constructed of durable high-quality light aluminum weighing 1.3 lbs.
BE PREPARED: You'll never know what adverse weather conditions you may run into
ADJUSTABLE: Shovel can adjust from 21” to 26” to 32”
